constituent: drift, water, water droplets, water pistol, ballot, old west, altar, show, two, small
koohiiStory1: In Florida, Bush through Kerry´s ballots into the water, watching them drift away and setting the whole country adrift.
koohiiStory2: The political fanatic stole all the ballots and dumped them in the stream. He calmly watched them drift away as the cops came to a screech behind him.
words: 漂う(ただよう): to drift about, to float, to hang in air
